verses.name: John 10:38
verses.text: But if I do, though ye believe not me, believe the works: that ye may know, and believe, that the Father is in me, and I in him.

verses.name: John 10:39
verses.text: Therefore they sought again to take him: but he escaped out of their hand,

verses.name: John 10:40
verses.text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized; and there he abode.

verses.name: John 10:41
verses.text: And many resorted unto him, and said, John did no miracle: but all things that John spake of this man were true.

verses.name: John 10:42
verses.text: And many believed on him there.
